# thunder_fw_tcp_reset_on_error (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform

  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}

resource "thunder_fw_tcp_reset_on_error" "test_thunder_fw_tcp_reset_on_error" {
  enable = 1
}
```
